## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c6abdc0de2494336f8910db74f0e2af7bca5655ef45f449f7b867677987d6145)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@huby/infovist-report' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
